summary: This is a search warrant issued by the U.S. District Court for the Southern District of New York authorizing the search of Jeffrey Epstein's residence at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY. The warrant seeks evidence related to violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 371 and 1591 (sex trafficking conspiracy and sex trafficking of minors), specifically targeting electronic devices and media containing communications, photographs, and records concerning victims.

persons.name: Henry Pitman
persons.context: Issued the search warrant for the premises at 9 East 71st Street, New York, NY, related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Search Warrant Issued for Epstein Residence
events.description: A federal search warrant was issued authorizing the search of Jeffrey Epstein's New York residence at 9 East 71st Street for evidence of sex trafficking crimes.

locations: 9 East 71st Street, New York, New York
keyFacts: The search warrant targets Jeffrey Epstein's New York City residence at 9 East 71st Street for evidence of sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.

The warrant specifically authorizes seizure of electronic devices and storage media containing communications, photographs (including nude/sexually suggestive images of teenage girls), and records related to victims.
The legal basis cited is violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 371 (conspiracy) and 1591 (sex trafficking of minors).
The warrant includes detailed procedures for forensic examination of electronic data, including keyword searches and recovery of deleted files.
The document references Case No. 19 Cr. 490 (RMB), indicating it's part of the broader criminal case against Epstein.
